description: Generally means cups/bowls, but used as Internet slang for 「tragedy」 (bēijù). Conversely, 「Comedy」 (Xǐjù) becomes 「Washing tackle」 (Xǐjù).

examples.chinese: 太水逆了,为什么会发生这种杯具呢
examples.translation: Such bad luck, why did this tragedy happen?

examples.chinese: 夫妻关系不好,就是最大的杯具
examples.translation: A bad relationship between husband and wife is the biggest tragedy

examples.chinese: 太杯具了,简直是天降横祸
examples.translation: Too tragic, simply a disaster from the sky
